plugin.name: MLc
plugin.description: Custom magnitude for local events measured on horizontal components

parameter.name: distMode
parameter.description:
Considered distance measure between source and receiver. Possible values are
hypocentral: hypocentral distance
epicentral: epicentral distance

parameter.name: calibrationType
parameter.description:
Type of magnitude calibration formula to be considered. The calibration parameters are considered accordingly. Currently supported are
"parametric": consider parameters of parametric configuration in parametric section
"A0": consider parameters of non-parametric configuration in A0 section.

group.name: A0
group.description: Parameters for A0, non-parametric magnitude calibration.

parameter.name: logA0
parameter.description: Overrides the calibration function log10(A0) for computing MLc per region. See logA0 description in the bindings.

group.name: parametric
group.description: Parameters for parametric magnitude calibration: MLc = log10(A) + c3 * log10(r/c5) + c2 * (r + c4) + c1 + c0(station)

parameter.name: c0
parameter.description: Overrides the calibration parameter c0 for computing MLc per region. See c0 description in the bindings.

parameter.name: c1
parameter.description: Overrides the calibration parameter c1 for computing MLc per region. See c1 description in the bindings.

parameter.name: c2
parameter.description: Overrides the calibration parameter c2 for computing MLc per region. See c2 description in the bindings.

parameter.name: c3
parameter.description: Overrides the calibration parameter c3 for computing MLc per region. See c3 description in the bindings.

parameter.name: c4

parameter.name: c5
parameter.description: Overrides the calibration parameter c5 for computing MLc per region. See c5 description in the bindings.

binding.name: MLc
binding.description: Custom magnitude for local events measured on horizontal components

extend-struct.description: Parameters for measuring MLc amplitudes. Add more parameters by adding an amplitude type profile 'MLc',

parameter.name: preFilter
parameter.description: The filter applied to raw records before applying Wood-Anderson simulation.

parameter.name: applyWoodAnderson
parameter.description: Applying Wood-Anderson simulation. To achieve displacement records without WA simulation, an integration filter can be applied with the pre-filter.

parameter.name: amplitudeScale
parameter.description:
Scaling value multiplied to the measured amplitudes to match the amplitude units expected by the magnitude calibration function.
Expected amplitudes are in units of mym but actual amplitudes provided from Wood-Anderson-corrected seismograms are in units of mm: amplitudeScale = 1000.
If data are not corrected for WA, measured amplitudes take the unit of gain-corrected data considering the preFilter: amplitudeScale converts between units of measured and excpected amplitude.

parameter.name: measureType
parameter.description:
Type for measuring amplitudes.
AbsMax: absolute maximum
MinMax: half difference between absolute maximum and minimum
PeakTrough: half difference between maximum and minimum on a half cycle

parameter.name: combiner
parameter.description:
Define how to combine the amplitudes measured on both horizontals components:
min: take the minimum
max: take the maxium
avgerage: form the average
geometric_mean: form the geometric mean

extend-struct.description: Parameters for computing MLc magnitudes from MLc amplitudes.

parameter.name: distMode
parameter.description:
Considered distance measure between source and receiver.
hypocentral: hypocentral distance
epicentral: epicentral distance

parameter.name: minDist
parameter.description: The minimum distance for computing magnitudes from amplitudes. Negative values deactivate the check.

parameter.name: maxDist
parameter.description: The maximum distance for computing magnitudes from amplitudes. Negative values deactivate the check.

parameter.name: minDepth
parameter.description: The minimum source depth below which magnitudes are computed.

parameter.name: maxDepth
parameter.description: The maximum source depth up to which magnitudes are computed.

parameter.name: calibrationType
parameter.description:
Type of magnitude calibration formula to be considered. The calibration parameters are considered accordingly.
"parametric": consider parameters of parametric configuration in parametric section
"A0": consider parameters of non-parametric configuration in A0 section.

group.name: A0
group.description: Parameters for A0, non-parametric magnitude calibration. Considered if magnitude.MLc.calibrationType = "A0".

parameter.name: logA0
parameter.description:
The non-parametric calibration function log10(A0).
Format: any list of distance-value pairs separated by comma. Values within pairs are separated by colon.
Example: "0:-1.3,60:-2.8,100:-3.0,400:-4.5,1000:-5.85" specifies 4 distance intervals from 0...60, 60...100, 100...400 and 400...1000 km distance. Within these intervals log10(A0) is interpolated linearly between -1.3...-2.8, -2.8...-3.0, -3.0...-4.5 and -4.5...-5.8, respectively.
Note: The first and last distance samples limit the maximum distance range for computing MLv.

group.name: parametric
group.description:
Parameters for parametric magnitude calibration: MLc = log10(A) + c7 * e^(c8 * r) + c6 * h + c3 * log10(r / c5) + c2 * (r + c4) + c1 + c0(station)
Considered if magnitude.MLc.calibrationType = "parametric".

parameter.name: c0
parameter.description: Station correction. This is the calibration value 'c0' applied in the parametric magnitude calibration formula.
